scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync --profile=s3 --delete --metadata-directive REPLACE --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=1800,public web s3://dropmeafile.com
scripts.deploy-pickup: aws s3 cp --profile=s3 --metadata-directive REPLACE --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=1800,public --content-type text/html pickup s3://dropmeafile.com
